title: The Garden Character Pack
description: A collection of characters from The Garden server.

new.name: Elia
new.description: A powerful sorceress who wields magic to protect The Garden.

new.name: Bluelink
new.description: A skilled hacker who keeps The Garden's systems secure.

new.name: EbonyBane
new.description: A fierce warrior who defends The Garden from its enemies.

new.name: Phantom
new.description: A mysterious figure who lurks in the shadows of The Garden.

new.name: Bluepelt
new.description: A loyal companion who follows Elia wherever she goes.

new.name: BaredFang
new.description: A shapeshifting creature who can take on the form of any animal.

new.name: Plaguedoctor
new.description: A healer who uses their knowledge of medicine to aid The Garden.
